response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product offers unparalleled benefits that align perfectly with your needs and expectations, making it an invaluable asset for you. Considering its exceptional value and the unique features it provides, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your experience and efficiency. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 10000}
